skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.
skill.summary: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill wh...

security_audit.summary: This is an official skill from the Anthropic skills repository and is pre-reviewed. No additional security risks were identified in the provided files.

content.value_statement: Designing distinctive interfaces is hard when results feel generic. This skill guides you to produce bold, production-grade frontend code with a clear aesthetic direction.
actual_capabilities: Selects a bold aesthetic direction before coding
Emphasizes distinctive typography and font pairing
Specifies cohesive color themes with CSS variables
Guides animation choices for high impact moments
Promotes creative layouts and atmospheric backgrounds
limitations: Does not generate image assets or media files
Does not run or test the produced code
Does not choose frameworks unless the user specifies one
Does not provide backend or deployment guidance

use_cases.title: Launch a bold landing page
use_cases.description: Create a memorable landing page concept with strong typography, color, and layout direction for a new product.

use_cases.title: Refresh a dashboard UI
use_cases.description: Redesign a data dashboard interface with a unique aesthetic and refined spacing, motion, and hierarchy.

use_cases.title: Style a React component set
use_cases.description: Apply a cohesive visual system and animations to a set of React components for a branded app experience.

prompt_templates.title: Simple page style
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a single page marketing layout in HTML and CSS with a bold, minimal aesthetic for a local coffee shop.

prompt_templates.title: Themed landing page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a landing page concept with a retro-futuristic theme for a robotics startup. Include typography, colors, and hero layout guidance.

prompt_templates.title: Component styling
prompt_templates.prompt: Style a React card component set with an editorial magazine aesthetic. Include motion and spacing details.

prompt_templates.title: Full UI direction
prompt_templates.prompt: Define a complete UI direction for a SaaS dashboard. Specify typography, color tokens, layout principles, and key animations.

output_examples.input: Create a bold landing page for a new music festival website.
output: Hero: oversized display type with condensed secondary font
Palette: deep black, hot orange, and cream accents
Layout: asymmetric grid with diagonal separators and layered posters
Motion: staggered headline reveal and subtle parallax on line art

best_practices: Provide clear audience and tone to shape the aesthetic
Specify technical constraints like framework and accessibility
Ask for a single strong visual concept before detailed code
anti_patterns: Requesting generic or safe designs without context
Mixing multiple aesthetic directions in one UI
Ignoring typography and spacing in favor of only colors

faq.question: Is this compatible with my framework?
faq.answer: Yes, but you should specify the framework you want, such as React, Vue, or plain HTML and CSS.

faq.question: What are the main limits?
faq.answer: It does not run code, generate images, or validate performance. It provides guidance and code structure only.

faq.question: Can it integrate with my design system?
faq.answer: Yes, provide your tokens, fonts, and components so the guidance can align with your system.

faq.question: Does it use or store my data?
faq.answer: No, it operates on your prompts only and does not store or transmit data.

faq.question: What if the output feels generic?
faq.answer: Provide a stronger aesthetic direction and clearer context to drive distinctive choices.

faq.question: How does it compare to general assistants?
faq.answer: It focuses on bold visual direction, typography, motion, and layout to avoid generic UI results.
